sourcesContent: import React, { Component, useState, useContext } from 'react'; import { ProductContext } from '../../Context/ProductContext/ProductContext'; import { UserContext } from '../../Context/UserContext/UserContext'; import Container from '@material-ui/core/Container'; import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'; import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import './Landing.css'; import { Link, withRouter, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { CssBaseline } from '@material-ui/core'; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ root: { padding: '2rem 0', }, section: { margin: '20vh 0', width: '100%', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', }, content: { marginBottom: '1rem', padding: '1rem', textAlign: 'center', }, button: { marginRight: '1rem', }, noDecoration: { textDecoration: 'none', }, map: { border: 'none', } })); function Landing(props) { const classes = useStyles(); const [products, setProducts] = useContext(ProductContext); const [user, setUser] = useContext(UserContext); return ( {user.loggedIn ? See what we offer Experience our ever growing offers, with more than 5 products ready to ship at any moment. : Hi, there! In order to experience all the advantages, please register with an account. } Why us? Fastest Shipping We ship out every order within an hour from receiving it. Never wait a month for your product ever again! Money Back Guarantee You will be refunded for every product that does not match the description. Highest Quality We sell products from verified vendors only. Liftime warranty on all products from our shop. Where to find us? ); } export default withRouter(Landing);
